alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 04 at 12:18PM EDT until April 07 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at Abbeville affecting Telfair, Dodge and Wilcox Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Abbeville...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at Abbeville. * WHEN...Until late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14 feet, Moderate flooding begins. Roads to homes along the west side of the river in Abbeville become inaccessible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:45 AM EDT Tuesday was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon and continue falling to 9.3 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
